title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine: Ibn Sirin agrees with Al-Nabulsi that alcohol is forbidden in a dream, but he stressed that it comes without difficulty and means that you will get a lot of money without getting tired, or if you are harmed in your sleep after drinking this, then you will get money after misery and strife, and the interpreters classified the symbols Wine is as follows. If you dream of a river of wine, you will get into big trouble no matter how much the river hits you. Seeing a large number of people drinking alcohol is a bad and malicious business. If you are in an elevated position similar to the position of a ruler and seeing wine means that you will be pushed away About your position. It is forbidden to get drunk in a dream from wine. Dreaming of getting drunk even without drinking means anxiety, sadness and fear. Selling wine is usury. Wine mixed with water means that you are mixing lawful money with forbidden money. If you drink water in the container (a clay jar in which the water is placed, you will have wealth Big and food. The dream of wine for single people. We looked at the books of interpreters to learn about the interpretation of the dream of drinking wine for a girl and we found that her dreams come true by God’s command. The expense here is divided into a lot of money, a new job, or a good husband, but on the condition that she is drinking wine without sugar or within limits. Reasonable. Otherwise, it is a bad omen dream, and he may enter into a forbidden partnership, or mix with bad companions. A dream about alcohol for a married woman. Interpretation: A dream about drinking alcohol for a married woman is considered a false vision and has many meanings. Things are happening around her and you do not feel them. A woman is psychologically unbalanced and feels lost. Her inability to balance her affairs. She does not know things about her husband. Indicates envy, hatred, or illness. People are gossiping about this woman and talking about her lies. A dream about empty wine Drunkenness: Seeing yourself drinking alcohol without losing your mind and its absence is a good and beneficial vision for its owner, because this dream interpretation of drinking alcohol and not being drunk in a dream means that lawful money awaits, but you will have a lot to live on, and this is because drunkenness in reality pushes a person to commit heinous crimes, so Seeing it in a dream is not worthy of praise. Seeing wine in a dream: You may only see wine in your dream without drinking it, and this is also a good vision, because it shows the general benefit in the world and no harm or evil will approach you. You may be afraid of things in your work or those that threaten your life. People, this is a promising vision for you in safety and reassurance, and you will not be exposed to harm to anyone. The first Shamloul website in the Arab world welcomes your comments below the article and we are happy to interpret your dreams. Don't forget to leave a comment below and indicate your relationship status.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of his uncle according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the death of an aunt in a dream indicates joy, happiness, comfort, and other interpretations that we will interpret for a single girl, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for men, such as the dream about my aunt. She died and she is dead and I am crying, and the vision of the dead aunt and the death of the living aunt by the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others on the topic: Interpretation of the death of an aunt in a dream, its positive meanings, the death of an aunt in a dream, you may get used to the fortuneteller himself. The scene of her funeral in a dream is an expression of joy, especially if this scene is devoid of crying, screaming, wailing, and wailing. This interpretation is based on the principle of juxtaposition, and is considered one of the most important mechanisms for dream interpretation, as death indicates life, and sadness indicates joy. Death in dream interpretation has many meanings. Aspects of interpretation, it is comfort, peace and tranquility if it is without burial. The Almighty is good to the one who died in the dream if the dreamer sees him being carried on his shoulders. The coffin of a dead aunt in a dream can symbolize a comfortable life unless the dirt is hidden. The death of Aunt Mahmoud, for both men and women, if life suddenly returns. At the end of the dream, the dreamer is overcome with great joy as he sees his aunt coming back to life. In this regard, we can rely on the nature of the feelings that the dreamer may experience when he receives the news of his aunt’s death in a dream. If feelings of sadness, anguish, and sourness dominate the overall landscape of the dream, the viewer themselves may fear that something bad or bad is happening. This type of dream is driven by fear, dread, and deep self-obsessions. Fear is often responsible for seeing death in a dream. But if the feelings associated with the death of the aunt in the dream are normal feelings without negative feelings, as if death has become a familiar topic, then this mainly reflects the alienation and distance that characterize the nature of the dreamer’s relationship with the family. Interpretation of the death of the aunt in One dream: If an unmarried woman dreams of the death of her aunt, her father’s sister, then this is good for her as long as she does not see manifestations of sadness and mourning in the dream. If the atmosphere of the funeral or funeral is somewhat strange, that is, different in appearance from the atmosphere of funerals in reality, then the funeral here is interpreted as “ Joy,” provided that the single woman is not seen as eating her food from the funeral, and that he does not see divided meat in her. If he sees this, then the aunt’s funeral here shows worries and problems, and the black color is disliked at funerals and funerals, especially if he sees unmarried people as if women are wearing it. Because these women express years of suffering and hardship, while it is praiseworthy in the interpretation that the (unmarried) girl sees her aunt’s funeral, and in it are women dressed in white, because this vision expresses the good years coming before her, full of people, years whose number corresponds. To the number of women who looked as if they were attending the funeral of an aunt. Interpretation of the death of an aunt in a dream for a married woman. The death of a married aunt in a dream may indicate the paradox of a year in which the married woman suffered some problems, a year full of worries, difficulties and problems... When we interpret the dream that you see in

title: Interpretation of the number 30 in a dream

preview.html: We will show you, dear reader from gptafser.com/, a comprehensive interpretation of the vision in the case of single women, men, pregnant women, married women, single women, and divorced women, as well as the opinion of some interpreters of this vision. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a single girl. Seeing one girl in a dream indicates the number 30. Think a lot about how old you are. And what will she do in the future? Seeing a single girl in dream number 30. It shows that she is constantly thinking about the relationship, and that she is afraid of not getting married, especially if she is old. Scientists interpreted seeing an unmarried girl in dream number 30. It indicates that he will be exposed to difficult circumstances. And obstacles in the coming period, and God knows best. Most of the interpretations of this vision in a single girl’s dream. It expresses her fear of growing old without getting married, and the appearance of the number in her dream indicates her age. Either zero in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates happy and positive news to come. See also : Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 51 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a married woman. The number 30 in a married woman’s dream indicates happy news. As well as her new pregnancy in the coming period, which will make her feel joy and happiness, God willing. It also announces the number 30 for a married woman. Family stability and the end of Her problems with her husband, because it indicates love and friendship. Seeing a married woman in a dream number 30 is evidence of the abundance of livelihood and blessing that she will enjoy with her husband, God willing. The vision also indicates improving his social and economic conditions. The number 30 in a married woman’s dream indicates her extreme fear for her home. And her family. It is evidence of her intense love for her children and she fears that they will be exposed to any harm. The number 30 in a married woman’s dream indicates her death, worries and sorrows, God willing. Seeing the number 30 in a dream for a married woman means that she enjoys stability and peace of mind. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream about The man and its meaning. Scientists interpreted a man’s vision of the number 30 in his dream as evidence that he is preoccupied with many issues. Therefore, he must focus on that to find solutions, God willing. Seeing a man in his dream with the number 30 is a good vision. It shows the strength of his character and the right decisions in the affairs of his life, God willing. And that he is characterized by this A man with purity of mind and the ability to resist his problems, God willing. Seeing the number 30 in a man’s dream means that his biography among people is good. His morals are good and he will gain the love of people, God willing. The vision also indicates that those around him are interested in his opinion in some of their personal matters. The number 30 indicates In a dream, it indicates concern and attention to the problems of age. It indicates constant thinking about age, and fear of aging. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the number 101 in a dream. The meaning of seeing the number 30 in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with the number 30 is evidence of her safety, God willing. The vision indicates Also to the period of pregnancy and that she will give birth easily. As for the number 0 in a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates the new life that she will live with her new child, God willing. The number 30 in a pregnant woman’s dream shows her extreme fear for her child who is carrying her. See some

title: Interpretation of a dream about my uncle combing his hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my uncle combing his hair in a dream. You want to know what the interpretation of a dream about my uncle combing his hair in a dream means. In the following lines, we present all this and more details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about my uncle combing his hair in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my uncle combing his hair in a dream. Perhaps combing will lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees someone combing his hair in a dream, this may mean that he will get rid of sadness and anxiety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees someone combing his hair In a dream, this could be a sign of kindness and relief from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. In a dream, an unmarried girl saw a person combing her hair in a dream that could indicate happiness and goodness, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself combing your hair in a dream, it may be a sign On recovery from illness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a woman combing my hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a woman combing my hair in a dream can lead to kindness and sustenance, and God knows best. Seeing hair combed to make it beautiful indicates goodness, God willing. If a married woman sees a woman combing her hair and making it beautiful, she may This indicates that she will turn to her to solve her problems. If the dreamer sees his wife combing his hair, this may indicate the help she provides to the husband, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of a man combing my hair in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a man combing my hair in a dream. Seeing a man combing a married woman’s hair could indicate crises. Which falls on her with the husband, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself being combed by someone, this may indicate kindness and benefit, and God knows best. The dream when you see someone holding The dreamer’s hair may be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a person who gives you money in a dream. Seeing donating money can also indicate not Commitment to worship, and that God has knowledge of the unseen, so attention must be paid to performing duties and acts of obedience, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As an unmarried girl sees someone ironing her hair, it can appear With a good appearance, God willing, as seeing a married woman ironing her hair could mean good news, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a divorced woman dreams of ironing her hair, it may be food, God willing. Interpretation of dreams about my mother-in-law combing my hair in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about yellow watermelon by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a yellow watermelon in a dream of a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, buying a yellow watermelon, cutting a sweet watermelon, and seeing a damaged watermelon according to Ibn Sirin, Imam. Sincere and many othersYellow watermelon in a dream is a praiseworthy dream most of the time, sometimes it is an unpleasant vision. The interpretation of dreams varies from person to person depending on place and time. If one sees in his dream that he is eating a watermelon and it tastes delicious, then this is evidence of kindness and nourishment soon for that person who sees it. Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream If you see yellow watermelon in a dream, it means an emotional encounter with no future. For patients, seeing yellow watermelon is a good sign for them. Recovery is approaching. If you see yourself buying a yellow watermelon in a dream, this means that you should beware of serious and excessive expenses that you may be exposed to. In some cases, watermelon can indicate disappointment on a family level. Seeing yourself buying a yellow watermelon indicates exorbitant and ordinary expenses. Yellow watermelon is praiseworthy on a family level. Friendships and not good for work. If you see picking yellow watermelon in a dream, it means that you may become a joke with your friends. Seeing watermelon in a dream by the seller indicates emotional closeness. Seeing yellow watermelon in a dream indicates humility at work. Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she goes To the market and buy a yellow watermelon and then eat it, and found its taste delicious and beautiful, this indicates that she will soon marry a suitable, well-off man, and she will. Live with him happily and in love. You find that the watermelon is rotten and inedible. This is evidence of deception and hypocrisy on those close to him. The deception will soon be revealed, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is looking for a yellow watermelon in the market and does not find it, this is evidence that she will pay off the debts soon, God willing. Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a woman sees A pregnant woman dreams that she cuts a watermelon and then eats it, and its color is reddish-yellow and its taste is beautiful and delicious. This is evidence of a natural and easy birth and that she will give birth. The boy is famous among the people. You cut it and find it inedible, then this is evidence of premature birth, but it will be in good health with the new baby, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is eating a lot of yellow watermelon even though it does not taste good, then this is evidence of... That this woman has problems and fears, but they will end soon, and if she sees a divorced woman. In her dream that she is selling yellow watermelon in a dream in the markets, this is evidence of kindness and nourishment coming her way. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of yellow watermelon in a dream for a man. If a man dreams that he is selling yellow watermelon in the markets and people agree to buy from him, then this is evidence of blessing and sustenance soon in the life of someone. He sees it. Interpretation of watermelon in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing money and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing money loss in a dream, it should be noted that money is currently the master of the season, because without money there is no life, and therefore money gives meaning to life and existence, in addition to being considered the reason for facilitating life matters, and through money one can practice his life, as well as buy the necessary needs and requirements alike, but what if a person dreams of losing and wasting money, there is no doubt that the person who wants to see will be affected by fear and tension as a result of this dream, and knowing the interpretation of this is what we will explain through our article Interpretation of seeing money loss in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of losing money in a dream Due to the abundance of money circulation and its use in life, in addition to its close association with most people’s sayings and actions, a person will certainly see money or visions of money in a dream, and the interpretation of this is as follows: In the event that money is lost by the one who saw it in a dream and then obtained it. This may indicate death and the end of the danger that threatens the life of the seer. Add to this interpretation that the owner of the vision will get rid of some of the problems and difficulties he faces. While if the dreamer sees money in his dream, this is a strong sign indicating a good change in the dreamer’s life. And if the money that the dreamer saw in his dream Abundantly, this may indicate that he has learned bad habits and customs. While if he loses money in his dream, this indicates that he has passed a negative stage that he has recently suffered from. In the same context, seeing the loss and loss of money in the dreamer's dream indicates the loss and loss of money. In the dreamer's negligence in his religion and worship and his lack of connection with God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream of losing money in a dream See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing money taken from an unknown person in a dream A dream of losing money in a dream for a married woman Certainly, seeing the loss of money in a married woman's dream can bring a sign and indicate changes in her life, and this is what we will learn in these lines: If a married woman sees in her dream the loss of money, this undoubtedly indicates her divorce from her husband. In general, losing money in a married woman's dream indicates the conflict and challenge between the spouses. This is because they are trying to build a happy married life apart from forming a good and positive family. Also, seeing a woman losing money indicates that her husband will lose some money. This vision also indicates that there is financial distress in their lives, and thus it will affect their lives and the marital relationship. In addition, seeing the loss of money expresses the lack of The ability of a woman to bear responsibilities towards her home. And if that woman sees in her dream that she has found money, this may indicate the amount of compensation after hardships and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about losing money in a dream See also: Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream by the most famous interpreters and its implications Interpretation of a dream about losing money in a dream for a single woman There is no doubt that there are different patterns of visions and dreams in a dream, as the interpretation of seeing the loss of money for an unmarried girl differs, and this is what we present here: If a girl wastes her money,

title: Everything that Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of fire in a dream

preview.html: Fire in a dream Seeing fire in a dream has many meanings that express extreme discomfort and fear, and to know the details of the dream, we present to you all the interpretations that were said about it from the point of view of interpretive scholars, as a person sometimes sees that it is lighting itself or that his tongues are raised in front of him in one of the houses or in his clothes or Other details. What is the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream? Sometimes fire expresses goodness and other times it indicates the evils and sins that a person commits in his life and his intense fear of God’s punishment upon him after his death. We will list all these details for you in the following lines: If one sees it from a distance in a dark place where only flames can be seen, then one's future holds a lot of hope as one reaches the desired goal in a shorter time than planned. Seeing it can express About the presence of a friend by his side trying to advise him and guide him on the right path, and he must receive this advice as long as he trusts his sincerity and love for him. If the king is a sinner, then he must quickly abandon the sins he commits, and fear God Almighty before it is too late. Seeing her is a warning to him of what It will happen to him in the end if he persists in his shameful actions and the need to listen to the voice of reason and conscience that comes from within him and calls him to repent to God (Glory be to Him). If he finds that he is trying to suppress it with the help of others, but it rises and rises, then there is a possibility that his reputation will be affected at this time by the words and accusations directed at him, and this will really affect his work and private life. Seeing fire in a dream if it is seen coming out of one of the houses not far from him. And it can also reach his house with its height and spread here and there, indicating that they are also among the companions of those who commit immorality, and are trying to take him with them on the path of sin. The interpretation of fire in a dream often causes terror for the dreamer, especially if he is far from God, as He feels that hell is his expected reward, but the door of repentance is open to everyone and he must knock on it quickly and not. There is a need to postpone.Interpretation of fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The imam said that seeing fire does not always mean that the dreamer is corrupt or guilty. There are those who see it as a kind of good news or a warning sometimes, and we can summarize his sayings and opinions in several places: If someone is inside and not afraid or anxious, he can come out of it as he is without being harmed, then he is a person loved by everyone, ready to obey God, and ask for His forgiveness. And his satisfaction, and someone tries to put him down. He is in trouble, but God protects him and cares for him with his eyes that never sleep. He also said that when it spreads in many places in the dreamer's dream, it is a sign that there is something attracting people to that area and that war or a takeover attempt may break out. If he tries to erase it He is the one who settles the dispute, and tries to reconcile the disputing parties without benefit or expectation of a salary, and his companions depend on him for his reasons and good management of matters. On the contrary, if he sees that he is the one who lights it up himself, then he can be one of the messengers of speech among the people,

preview.html: What is this? Range of vision and what are the signs and times of their truth, because the world of visions and dreams contains many secrets and mysteries, and few of us have information about this basic human science. Range of vision Arab dream interpretation scholars have indicated that seeing an hour after the afternoon prayer is nothing but manipulation by Satan This time is the time of their flow and depends on the confusion between truth and falsehood. By reviewing the books of the Prophet’s biography, we find that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said that the vision is divided into three parts, and thus we can determine the dates of the correct visions. Classification of human dreams The extent of the vision’s fulfillment the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, divided He classified dreams into three categories, and it was possible to infer from them and investigate the history of the correct vision, which are as follows: The terror of Satan brings sadness and anxiety to the heart of the dreamer. Talking to oneself, which is the result of the problems that a person experiences in his daily life and psychological pressures. The good vision that will come true. God willing, and this section was created by God for some of His servants and is not accessible to everyone. The extent of the vision: When does the dream come true? Interpreters differed as to when the vision comes true after seeing it in a dream, and some researchers indicated that the vision that comes at the beginning of the night or immediately after the evening prayer comes true after several years. These scholars relied on the vision of the Prophet of God, Joseph bin Jacob, peace be upon them all, and it came true after many years, which took forty years to interpret. Some interpretation scholars also confirmed that the vision at dawn will come true quickly and no later than the beginning of the new year. Good vision timesThere is no time. Specific to the true vision, but interpretation scholars unanimously agree that before dawn is one of the best dreams that a person sees at the time of his sleep, and part of it is separate, and it emphasized the possibility of the arrival of demons. In those visions at dawn. Thus we arrive at the fact that there is no specific time for visions. There is no need for a specific time for true visions. They may occur in the morning sleep, before or after dawn, or in the dead of the night. Signs of true visions. There are some signs through which we can We conclude a real vision, which is as follows:You must be free of nightmares and self-talk. It is a vision without the events that a person experiences when he wakes up. A good vision does not contain abnormal events, as it must be clear and understandable. Will the vision come true? A large number suggest From the interpreters of dreams and visions, the time of their appearance is the time of interpreting them and realizing what they carry, whether it is good or vice versa. The translator Al-Nabulsi confirmed that the dream remains pending until it is interpreted, and if it is interpreted, it will happen. The translator Bin Al-Hussein Bin Mahmoud said that the vision before the interpretation does not mean anything, and therefore Neither good nor evil will follow us, and when they are expressed, the dreamer is affected by what the vision conveys to him. A sign of the nearness of the vision. As evidence of the fulfillment of the vision, the dwelling that the dreamer saw in his dream becomes similar to the dwelling in which he lives. For example, if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is at home Which he actually lives in and was quite similar to F

title: I dreamed that I was buying guava

preview.html: I dreamed that I bought a guava in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Guava is a tropical fruit that has many health benefits for the human body and promotes skin and complexion health, in addition to helping in the prevention of many diseases. Today, through this article, we will present to youDreamed about buying a guava. For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the dreamer’s condition. Whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was buying guava in a dream. Seeing buying guava in a dream indicates that the dreamer has gotten rid of all the worries and problems that he was facing in the past period. Buying guava in a dream also indicates that the monarch is a reckless person who makes all his decisions based on Hurry without thinking and contemplating the result. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a guava tree in a dream. Seeing a guava in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a guava in a dream. It indicates that God will bless the fortuneteller with a lot of lawful money in the coming period. Eating a rotten guava in a dream, which indicates a lot. Of the bad sayings about people and lies, and God knows best. Seeing an unfit guava in a dream indicates that the dreamer has suffered many losses in his professional and personal life. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a guava in a dream. Seeing guava in a single woman’s dream. Seeing unmarried people eating seedless guava. In a dream, her diet indicates blessings, kindness, and peace of mind. Eating guava juice in a dream for a single woman indicates that God will bless her with many good things in the coming season. Seeing someone giving her a plate of guava and eating from it in a dream shows that there are many positive changes in her life. Eat A yellow guava in a dream for a single woman indicates that he will be exposed to serious health conditions in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing a guava in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman picking a guava from a tree in a dream shows that he will reach the goal that he has been striving for for a long time. If a married woman dreams that Her husband gives her a guava, and this indicates that promising things will happen in her husband’s life that will make the family happy and happy. A married woman seeing a delicious guava fruit in a dream announces her good and abundant livelihood for her and her family in the coming period. Seeing a guava tree in a dream Seeing a guava tree in a dream indicates that The dreamer will get rid of all the disagreements and judgments that existed between him and those close to him. A guava tree in a dream announces the abundance of blessings and courage in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a guava tree in a dream may also indicate that the dreamer will achieve great success and distinction in his academic and professional life. Read another explanation: I dreamed that I Drink sugarcane juice. Seeing guava juice in a dream. Seeing yourself drinking guava juice in a dream indicates that the coming period of his life will be full of goodness and blessings, and his care will be good and things will be easy. title: Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin who killed his father

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a son who kills his father in Ibn Sirin. Murder is considered to mean a person ending the life of another person, as it falls within the list of criminal acts, and murder can be dreamed by many people in a dream that causes them panic and anxiety, so today through the Encyclopedia Net website, we will We refer to the interpretation of the dream of a son killing his father by Ibn Sirin for both men and women, according to the difference in social status.Interpretation of the dream of Ibn Sirin killing his fatherWhen the dreamer sees himself killing someone in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer desires to obtain power and rule. Also, when the dreamer sees himself killing someone in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will face a problem that he wants to find a solution for. When the dreamer sees himself beating someone to death in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer has a lot of anger that It makes him feel frustrated. Also, when the dreamer sees himself being killed repeatedly in a dream, it may indicate that the dreamer is facing mental struggles. When the dreamer sees himself killing someone to defend himself in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will change his circumstances for the better. Also, when the dreamer sees himself killing a helpless person in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be affected by anxiety, sadness, and anguish. When the dreamer sees himself killing his father in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will change all his circumstances in the coming period. Also, when the dreamer sees that he saw a person killed in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a member of his family die. When the dreamer sees that he saw a person killed in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer feels very angry with himself or with others. this person. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is killed in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to great danger in his life. When the dreamer sees that he is killing someone and then fails in the dream, it may mean that the dreamer will try to embarrass someone, but he will fail. Also, when you see the owner of the dream and a married woman dreaming of repeated killing in a dream, this may indicate that the owner of the dream is afraid that her husband will harm her. When you see the owner of the dream killing many people in a dream, this may indicate that the owner of the dream will kill a large number of her friends. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is killing someone in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer has great jealousy or hatred towards that person. Interpretation of a dream about a son who killed his father by Ibn Shaheen When the dreamer sees that someone has killed him in a dream, this may indicate Until the dreamer will have great power or kingship. Also, when the dreamer sees himself killing his son in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve a lawful life in this world. When the dreamer sees himself killing his son in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will pursue his son to gain money and wealth. Also, when the dreamer sees that he is killing his son in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is killing his son
